I dont completely understand how playing games with one of her friends is hitting on her. We have broken up, and she still insists on trying to control every aspect of what im doing. Everything has to be by her rules, if it doesnt benefit her why should she do it.  The only reason she came over to give me my stuff any of the like 3-5 times she only did it because we had a chance at getting back together. So of course this time when there is no chance she is goin to take my ....MY STUFF  and donate it to someone else..... excuse me? 
Do i hear Federal offense coming in her direction like a baseball from a pitcher.  You cant just take my shit and donate it, or give it away, its mine and belongs to me, and im sure its prolly mario party which i have not seen at my house and im pretty sure i left it in her rez apt for her and us to use. 

She also has the nerve to say i never cared.... Examples of me caring- valentines day, when she was in trouble, spending all of what money i earned in landscaping on her or us,  nothing really on me unless it was for work or occasionally a video game, or on her parents, and one day in the year my family....aka christmas, which in any case i spent so much on her the only thing i could buy my family was in the 20 dollars and cheaper range.  my mom got a freaking picture frame, i cant imagine how shitty she must have felt.
Hardly ever seeing my friends, like i saw friends 3 maybe 4 times a year, that was birthday, and when they came into tim hortons, or when i went out because me and her had a 1 day to less than 24 hr break up.  i came to toronto every  other weekend or at least tried to even though i was broke, in the hole, at one point i was -369 dollars, and im never that deep, i only have 500 overdraft protection.
I did pretty much everything that she told me to.  my friends call "can you hang out man"  ..  "can i"   "no"    "no sorry guys i cant"  
I didnt have any of my friends in my phone- i had to relinquish my phone because i couldnt be trusted  so she could check who ive been talking to. i canceled my car insurance so i would have enough money to come up to see her and my car sat in the back yard and died,  



This is all i want to write for now

(a) Happiness (b) Anger (c) Surprised
(d) Sadness (e) Fear (f) Disgust
(g) Neutral

am i stupid to cope

While humans may consider themselves highly sophisticated beings, a new study says that when it comes to choosing a mate, we resort to the most basic of selection processes: looks.

CBC News

If beauty is the key trait men and women look for, as a new study suggests, could Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt be the epitome of human evolution?
(Associated Press)

Despite claims by individuals to the contrary, physical beauty is the key trait men look for, according to research by Indiana University cognitive scientist Peter Todd. Women, on the other hand, are choosier but tend to pick men who can offer material wealth and security that is on par with how the women perceive their own attractiveness.

"Evolutionary theories in psychology suggest that men and women should trade off different traits in each other, and when we look at the actual mate choices people make, this is what we find evidence for," Todd said in a release in advance of his study, which is to be published this week in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences.

"Ancestral individuals who made their mate choices in this way - women trading off their attractiveness for higher-quality men and men looking for any attractive women who will accept them - would have had an evolutionary advantage in greater numbers of successful offspring."

The study used a speed-dating session to compare what people said they wanted in a mate with whom they actually chose. Speed dating is where men and women have a number of "mini-dates" that last only a few minutes, giving them only a short time to decide whether they would like to go on a proper date with that person.

At the end of the mini-date, the men and women must check a box on a card to indicate whether or not they would like to see the other person again.

Todd and his research colleagues say speed-dating events are a "microcosm where mate choices are made sequentially in a faster and more formalized fashion than in daily life."

In the study, 46 adults in a speed-dating session in Germany were asked to fill out a questionnaire that assessed themselves and their ideal mate, grading traits such as physical attractiveness, financial status, health and parenting qualities.

Most said they wanted a mate like themselves, yet when the sessions began, the men sought the more attractive women. The women, meanwhile, were drawn to material wealth and security, and set their standards according to how they viewed their own attractiveness.

The study also found that men wanted to see half the women they met again, while the women wanted to meet only a third of the men again.

Todd said he plans to conduct several other speed-dating sessions to confirm the findings.

"Speed dating lets us look at a large number of mate-choice decisions collected in a short amount of time," he said. "It only captures the initial stage of the extended process involved in long-term mate choice. But that initial expression of interest is crucial for launching everything else."

i like to be gentle, caring, nice, generous, polite, curteous,  but im also the opposite of those at times,  sometimes im a hypocrit to and ill admit it
i work at tim hortons and any person who oders a whole sh it load i get pissed but when i go thru drive thru i order a whole shitload.... 
i wish ppl would apologise to me for what they do, cuz im always apologising for what i do
it may take me a while but i'll do it eventually
i would like ppl to say something to me first but i know they never will
i wish ppl were more accepting of me but then id prolly get worse,  its hard to break a habit, 
when all compliments fail try just telling the truth it works better than trying to be poetic and romantic,  i like being poetic and romantic  it feels more special, but the truth is way more real, say what u mean, these are things i need to do,  as well as some others,  

i hate myself
i want everyone around me happy
i spend pretty much every day with someone and i dont care that my mom says i spend too much time away from home..... i hate her anyway.  i wish i was with her 24/7 i wish i was with her now

i feel horrible, everytime, she hides something from me, i think it must be important and she just doesnt want to lie cuz she doesnt lie, but that it would hurt me
and suposedly its for the best, but sometimes id rather just know about it.
i love her so much it hurts like chopping my own leg off with a rusted broken saw.
but i cant help but think im letting her down
that im the reason she is in pain
but then sometimes i see it, the glimmer of happiness, it doesnt show often or even much around me but then i read what she posts and it fills me with joy to see that she loves me, because i love her and want to be with her always
i jsut wish i wasnt so much of an asshole, that i was more considerate, im always thinking of her but when she is arounf my inhibitions fail, my suave personality dies, my abilty to sweet talk and charm women is useless, its like im superman and she is kryptonite,  so wrong for each other but so right at the same time,  she takes away my abilities and makes me the real me,  superman is fake and his powers are everything, but instead of being powerless around her i just feel real, i dont feel weak , i feel like she is the only person who knows who i really am, because to everyone else ima fake.  

i love u and will always forever till i die kristin, i hope u feel the same way
